item.content:encoded:
Doctrine of Discovery Hotel Rooms

We have a block of 20 rooms reserved at Hampton Inn – Syracuse/Clay at a discounted rate of $109.00 per night. Deadline for reserving rooms at the conference rate is August 18, 2018; after August 18, any unreserved rooms will be released, and the conference discount will no longer be available.
Please book the rooms by phone and mention the Group Name: DoD conference (@ Skä·noñh Center)
Hampton Inn – Syracuse/Clay
3948 State Highway 31, Liverpool, NY 13090
Phone: 315-622-3443
Fax: 315-622-3446

RESERVATION PROCEDURES

Reservations will be made in the following manner – . If reservations are via rooming list, please forward this list to the attention of your Sales Manager on or before Cut-Off Date of 07/18/2018. The rooming list should indicate any guests requiring special attention. Reservations received after Cut-Off Date, are subject to rate and/or space availability. Should additional rooms be required after Cut-Off Date, the Hotel will make every effort to accommodate this request. Individual Call-in reservations must be guaranteed by a valid major credit card, which will be supplied at the time of reservation. Reservations must be cancelled by 6:00 PM EST Two (2) days prior to arrival to avoid a penalty of one (1) night stay plus taxes. If the reservation is no longer required and is not cancelled prior to this time, the reservation will be released and subsequent room and tax charges will be billed to the credit card on file.
Back to Doctrine of Discovery Event Page
